itu.beddernet.datalink.bluetooth
Class BluetoothDatalink

java.lang.Object
  itu.beddernet.datalink.bluetooth.BluetoothDatalink
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatalinkInterface
public class BluetoothDatalink
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatalinkInterface

Main class for the bluetooth datalink layer implements DatalinkInterface to allow communication from the Router layer.

Author:
Gober

connectToNetwork in interface DatalinkInterface

sendPacket

public boolean sendPacket(long na,
                          byte[] pckt)
Method to send packets to a given Network Address. If an attempt to send to a neighbour failes it performs actions to remove it from the neighbour list

Specified by:
sendPacket in interface DatalinkInterface
Parameters:
na - The address to send to
pckt - The packet to send
